    Soba Noodles with Crispy Tofu and Cilantro Avocado Sauce

    Published: Aug 5, 2022 by Kristi · This post may contain affiliate links · Leave a Comment

    Jump to Recipe·Print Recipe
    Print

    Soba Noodles with Crispy Tofu and Cilantro Avocado Sauce

    Print Recipe

    ★ 5 Stars ☆ ★ 4 Stars ☆ ★ 3 Stars ☆ ★ 2 Stars ☆ ★ 1 Star ☆

    No reviews

    Noodles and tofu is an amazing combination. Especially when it is prepared with a tasty sauce. These Soba Noodles with Crispy Tofu and Cilantro Avocado Sauce will be your new favorite noodle recipe.

    These noodles are simple to make but full of flavor. The cilantro avocado sauce offers a unique flavor profile.

    Let's get into the recipe.

    These soba noodles with crispy tofu are

    • easy to make
    • healthy for you
    • full of protein, fiber and healthy fats
    • covered with a delicious sauce
    • perfect for a healthy dinner recipe
    • vegan, gluten free and dairy free

    What do I need to make soba noodles with crispy tofu?

    • tofu
    • oil
    • starch
    • soy sauce
    • salt/pepper
    • garlic powder
    • cilantro
    • sesame oil
    • water
    • lime
    • ginger
    • garlic
    • miso
    • maple syrup

    Other plant based recipes to try

    • vegan zucchini pizza
    • asian chickpea salad
    • roasted red pepper and carrot pasta

    If you make these Soba Noodles with Crispy Tofu and Cilantro Avocado Sauce, please leave me a rating and review. This is the best way to support me!

    Tag me on Instagram so I can repost you!

    • Author: Kristi Roeder
    • Prep Time: 10
    • Cook Time: 30
    • Total Time: 40 minutes

    Ingredients

    Scale

    This makes 2-3 servings of noodles

    tofu

    • 1 block tofu - cubed
    • 1 tbsp oil
    • 2 tbsp arrowroot starch
    • ½ tbsp soy sauce
    • pinch salt/pepper
    • pinch garlic powder

    Cilantro avocado sauce

    • 1 bunch cilantro
    • 2 tbsp sesame oil
    • ¼ cup water
    • juice from ½ lime
    • ¼ inch piece of ginger
    • 1 garlic clove
    • 1 tbsp miso (can sub soy sauce or 1 tsp salt)
    • 1 tsp maple syrup

    + 1 pack cooked soba noodles or pasta of choice

    Instructions

    1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees.
    2. Toss tofu in starch, oil, and spices. Bake for 30 minutes.
    3. Blend together sauce ingredients.
    4. Toss cooked noodles with sauce and tofu. Dig in.

    Did you make this recipe?
